record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Aaron Firoved and Nathan Lesser, both fellows on detail to my Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs staff, and Cherrie Daniels, a fellow on detail from my personal office, have leave to the floor for the duration of the debate on the bill, S. 4.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
